trans-unit.source: Represents an element for associating a semantic value with a phrase in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 表示項目，用來將語意值與文法中的一個片語產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This object is similar to the `tag` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: 這個物件是類似於`tag`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 所定義的項目[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版。](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> property of this object cannot be script.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>此物件的屬性不可為指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> can be of the type <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int32>, or <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>類型可以是<xref:System.Boolean>， <xref:System.Double>， <xref:System.Int32>，或<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: String values must be enclosed in double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 字串值必須括在雙引號中。

trans-unit.source: To add semantics as script, use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>.
trans-unit.target: 若要將語意加入做為指令碼，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar for choosing the cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立選擇航班城市的文法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A> to assign a semantic value to each city, which is the code for the city's airport.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A>語意的值指派至每個城市，是城市的機場的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The example constructs two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> instances, each of which specifies a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建構兩個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>執行個體，每個皆指定語意索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Both rule references target the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object, named `cities`, but tag the recognition result from the rule reference with a different semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 同時規則參考目標相同<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>物件，名為`cities`，但具有不同的語意索引鍵標記規則參考的辨識結果。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key identifies a recognized city as the departure city or the arrival city for the flight.
trans-unit.target: 語意索引鍵識別為離開縣 （市） 或班機抵達縣 （市） 可辨識縣 （市）。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event uses the keys to retrieve the semantics values created using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A> from the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件會使用該索引鍵來擷取使用所建立的語意值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A>從辨識結果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 用來設定 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> class, specifying a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 類別的新執行個體，並指定執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar for choosing the cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立選擇航班城市的文法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A> to assign a semantic value to each city, which is the code for the city's airport.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A>語意的值指派至每個城市，是城市的機場的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The example constructs two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> instances, each of which specifies a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建構兩個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>執行個體，每個皆指定語意索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Both rule references target the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object, named `cities`, but tag the recognition result from the rule reference with a different semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 同時規則參考目標相同<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>物件，名為`cities`，但具有不同的語意索引鍵標記規則參考的辨識結果。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key identifies a recognized city as the departure city or the arrival city for the flight.
trans-unit.target: 語意索引鍵識別為離開縣 （市） 或班機抵達縣 （市） 可辨識縣 （市）。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event uses the keys to retrieve the semantics values created using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A> from the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件會使用該索引鍵來擷取使用所建立的語意值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.%23ctor%2A>從辨識結果。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string used to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name" /> 物件上用來設定 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 屬性的字串。

trans-unit.source: The object used to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> 物件上用來設定 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> class, specifying a name and a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 類別的新執行個體，並指定執行個體的名稱和值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 執行個體名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name" /> to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name" /> 設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value contained in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 執行個體中包含的值。

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag" /> 執行個體中包含的值。

trans-unit.source: The valid types for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> property are:
trans-unit.target: 有效的類型為<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>屬性：

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> to an invalid type.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value" /> 設為無效的型別。
